data.meanings: To heat, become hot or very hot, melt. Boiling water. Loyal/close friend/relative. Black smoke.
data.sentence: The word حَمِيمًا comes from the root ح م م and is associated with the meanings: To heat, become hot or very hot, melt. Boiling water. Loyal/close friend/relative. Black smoke.

data.meanings: darkness, the night; shed tears, poured water; intense coldness; watery/thick purulent matter that flows or drips; intensely red (applied to she-camel)
data.sentence: The word وَغَسَّاقًا comes from the root غ س ق and is associated with the meanings: darkness, the night; shed tears, poured water; intense coldness; watery/thick purulent matter that flows or drips; intensely red (applied to she-camel)
